Drinks.name: Gin Fizz
Drinks.directions: Pour 2oz gin, 1oz lemon juice, 3/4oz simple syrup, and egg white into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake then strain into a glass. Top off with soda water

Drinks.name: Hurricane
Drinks.directions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add 2oz of each ingeredient, the squeezed lime juice, and shake. Pour into a glass. Garnish with an Orange wedge and cherry

Drinks.name: Espresso Martini
Drinks.directions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add 2 oz vodka, 1/2 oz simple syrup, 1/2 oz coffee liqueur. Strain into a glass. Garnish with coffee beans

Drinks.name: Lost Plane
Drinks.directions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add 3/4 oz of each ingredient and shake. Strain into a glass. Garnish with a lemon twist

Drinks.name: Aperol Spritz
Drinks.directions: Add 3 oz prosecco, 2 oz aperol, 1 oz soda water to a wine glass. Garnish with an orange wedge

Drinks.name: Gimlet
Drinks.directions: Add 3 oz vodka, 1/2 oz lime juice, 1/2 oz simple syrup to a shaker. Shake and strain over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge

Drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea
Drinks.directions: Pour 3/4 oz each ingredient over ice. Top with coke. Garnish with a lemon wedge

Drinks.name: Valencia
Drinks.directions: Pour 1.5 oz Brandy, 1 tblsp orange juice, and 2 dashes of bitters into a shaker with ice. strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel
